list.expr: group by (container, alertname) (ALERTS{namespace="vspspr-$environment", container=~".+", tier="", alertstate="firing"})
list.name: Alerts

panels.description: Total number of prices that came to the repository
panels.title: Proposed Prices

panels.description: Prices that the repository automatically filtered out and didn't insert
panels.title: Discarded Prices

panels.description: Price changes that have been announced asynchronously

targets.expr: sum(increase(prices_announcer_announced_total{namespace="vspspr-${environment}", container="price-changes-announcer"}[$period])) or vector(0)

panels.title: Announced Prices

panels.description: Prices waiting to be inserted into the repository
panels.title: Pending Prices

panels.description: Prices for which the repository experienced an error during the insertion process
panels.title: Stuck Prices

panels.description: % of the search requests that received a response from the repository
panels.title: Search Availability

panels.description: % of fulfilled searches where the repository found a price for the requested (item, location) pair
panels.title: Search Еfficiency

options.content:
🔈 Proposed Received for uploading
✔️ Created Created new price
✔️ Updated Updated existing price
⚠️ Stuck Faced an error at uploading
❌ Invalid Discared due to invalid parameters
❌ Equivalent Ignored as exact copy of existing
❌ Duplicate Ignored as copy of other proposed
❌ Outdated Ignored as old update of existing
❌ Uneditable Ignored as forbidden update of immutable fields OR statuses
📣 Announced Available for async consumption

targets.expr: {namespace="vspspr-${environment}"} | pod_labels_app_kubernetes_io_name=~"price-changes-api|prices-uploader|price-changes-announcer" | json | level=~"ERROR|WARN"| line_format "| {{ printf \"%-3.3s\" .origin }} | {{.message | replace \"\\n\" \" \" }}"

options.content:
🚀 Activated Reached start date, became available for consumers
🗑️ Deactivated Substituted by other price, moved to archive

targets.expr: {namespace="vspspr-${environment}"} | pod_labels_app_kubernetes_io_name=~"prices-api|prices-mashup" | json | level=~"ERROR|WARN"| line_format "| {{.message | replace \"\\n\" \" \" }}}}"

panels.description: Total number of prices that were read from the integration source
panels.title: Received Prices

panels.description: Total number of prices that came to the repository
panels.title: Proposed Prices

panels.description: Prices that the repository automatically filtered out and didn't insert
panels.title: Discarded Prices

panels.description: Prices waiting to be inserted into the repository
panels.title: Pending Prices

panels.description: Prices for which the repository experienced an error during the insertion process
panels.title: Stuck Prices

panels.description: Prices that have an unreadable format and can't be handled by the repository
panels.title: Unreadable Prices

panels.description: Prices that exists in the integration source, but are irrelevant to the price repository (e.g. inactive prices)
panels.title: Excess Prices
